section.text: Erotic roleplay (ERP), hate speech, sexual content, and illegal content are strictly prohibited. This is a zero-tolerance rule and will result in a permanent ban.
Romance is allowed, provided it does not involve sexual actions or content.
All actions are considered in-character and roleplayed. Situations must be escalated or de-escalated appropriately.
This is a High Roleplay (HRP) server. Players are expected to put effort into their characters and actions and to be as engaging and interesting as reasonably possible.
Any actions that may put the server at risk of being de-hubbed or de-authorized will result in a permanent ban.
Player characters must be 18 years of age or older. Characters younger than 18 are not permitted.
English is the primary language of the server. Exceptions may be made for character accents or gimmicks, provided communication remains clear.
Do not share round information or in-character events outside of the game, including on Discord.
